body.name: T-fal Professional VX3 Brushed Nonstick with Stainless Steel Handle Fry Pan 10 Inch, Oven Broiler Safe 400F Cookware, Pots and Pans, Restaurant Grade, Certified by the NSF and CBA, Black

features: Cook like a pro: Certified by the NSF and CBA, this frypan is engineered to last with its professional-grade body that offers exceptional durability. This 10 inch Frypan is great for salmon, shrimp, or steaks due to its size.
Extra-long, triple-riveted, stainless-steel handle: Features a removable silicone sleeve ensuring a sturdy, non-slip grip and great control of the pan while you toss ingredients like a seasoned chef.
Platinum Non-Stick coating: Our longest lasting non-stick is 10x more resistant compared to T-fal basic coatings for outstanding performance.
Durable Construction: 100% recycled aluminum body¹ and an even heat base to prevent hotspots while cooking.¹ 72% of total product is made out of recycled material.

Oven safe & cooktop compatibility: Oven safe up to 400°F (500°F without the silicone sleeve). Compatible with all cooktops, excluding induction. With Thermo-Spot technology, the unique heat indicator that shows when the pans are properly preheated.
body.description: Cook like a pro with T-fal Professional VX3, the ultimate cookware series designed for the everyday cook who wants to take their cooking to the next level. These exceptional pans are NSF and CBA certified and feature T-fal's Platinum Non-Stick coating which is 10x more resistant vs. our basic coatings. It’s triple-riveted, extra-long stainless-steel handle includes a removable silicone cover that provides a secure, non-slip grip for effortless maneuvering. Prepare to elevate your culinary skills as the professional-grade body and PTFE non-stick coating empower you to masterfully sauté, sear, and toss with finesse. This product contains PTFE for its non-stick properties. For more information about chemicals in this product, visit: www.t-falusa.com/cookware-commitments

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cook Like a Pro Triple-riveted, extra-long stainless-steel handle and a professional-grade body that allows you to toss ingredients like a seasoned chef. 5 Layer Platinum Non-stick 10x more resistant vs. basic T-fal coatings. Designed for tough usage and durability. Thermo-Spot Technology Unique heat indicator turns solid red when the pan is properly preheated for a perfect sear every time. Practical Oven Safe Design This collection is oven safe up to 400°F with the silicone sleeve on and up to 500°F without the sleeve.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The right pan for the job
reviews.reviewText: This pan is wonderful! It heats evenly and cooks evenly. Nothing sticks to it, and cleanup is a breeze.A long as you follow the manufacturers guidelines to clean using a non-abrasive sponge, never use metal utensils and only cook on medium heat or lower, this pan will last a long time.I season mine before every use by drizzling a small amount of cooking oil onto the surface of the pan, and then using a silicone brush to evenly distribute the oil across the surface and up the sides of the pan as well. I then heat it up normally and cook. Everything just glides on the surface with ease.Based on my experience with this one, I'm thinking of buying the 10-inch model now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The T-fal Professional VX3 a high-quality frying pan that is both stylish and functional.
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the T-fal Professional VX3 12-inch Fry Pan, and I must say it has exceeded my expectations in every way!First and foremost, the brushed aluminum design combined with the stainless steel handle gives this fry pan a sleek and professional look that instantly upgrades my kitchen. It's not just aesthetically pleasing; it's also incredibly durable. I can tell that this pan is built to last.When it comes to cooking performance, this fry pan truly shines. The 12-inch size is perfect for cooking larger meals or for when I have guests over. The non-stick surface is a game-changer. I've used it for everything from frying eggs to searing steaks, and not once have I experienced sticking or uneven cooking. Cleanup is a breeze – a quick wipe with a paper towel, and it's ready for the next use.The even heat distribution is impressive, ensuring that my food cooks evenly and consistently every time. The stainless steel handle stays cool on the stovetop, so I don't have to worry about burns or using oven mitts. It's these small details that make a big difference in my cooking experience.In summary, the T-fal Professional VX3 12-inch Fry Pan is a top-notch addition to any kitchen. It's stylish, durable, and delivers exceptional cooking results. I couldn't be happier with my purchase, and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a high-quality frying pan. It has quickly become an essential tool in my kitchen, and I can't imagine cooking without it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's heavier then I thought but it's very easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Can't be beat for the price. Light, absolutely no sticking. Even heat distribution, and easiest cleaning. Basically run under water and wipe with sponge!

reviews.reviewText: I like the size and quality. It works like a dream. I would suggest reading the use and care instructions to receive better luck long term. There was also a coupon involved so it was a bargain and much better than the one it replaced.
